tasks.title: Add coverage for --next selection
definition_of_done: New test asserts --next selects the first runnable task.
Test clarifies default behavior when --next is omitted in single-run mode.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Add a focused bash test that exercises --next with a small tasks file and checks stdout + exit status.

tasks.title: Add dependency-ordering test for --task-id
definition_of_done: Test requests a later task-id and asserts exit code 6 plus the blocking-task message.
Test uses a minimal tasks file with an earlier non-completed task.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Stub codex so it is never invoked and validate the stderr message and non-zero exit.

tasks.title: Add reset-task behavior test
definition_of_done: Test verifies --reset-task clears observability.run_attempts and updates status/last_run_id as expected.
Test runs lever internal task-agent with a stub codex result.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Seed a task with observability fields, run with --reset-task, then inspect prd.json after the run.

tasks.title: Add missing result.json failure-path test
definition_of_done: Test simulates codex without writing result.json and expects exit 10.
Task status is set to blocked with a note referencing the codex log.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Use a codex stub that exits 0 but does not write --output-last-message, then verify task status and logs.

tasks.title: Add attempt-limit block test
definition_of_done: Test seeds run_attempts at MAX_RUN_ATTEMPTS and confirms exit 11 and blocked status.
Test asserts no codex invocation occurs once the limit is reached.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Write a task with observability.run_attempts = 3 and verify the guard triggers before codex.

tasks.title: Add unsupported model rejection test
definition_of_done: Test uses a task model outside the allow-list and expects exit 2.
Error message references the unsupported model and task id.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Keep the tasks file minimal and run lever with internal agent to hit model_supported guard.

tasks.title: Add bare-array tasks file test
definition_of_done: Test uses a tasks JSON file as a bare array (no "tasks" key).
Lever selects the first runnable task without error.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Create a temporary tasks.json containing only an array and check selected task output.

tasks.title: Add delay validation test
definition_of_done: Test runs with --delay but without --loop and expects a non-zero exit.
Error message mentions that --delay requires --loop.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Use cargo run with a minimal repo and assert the validation error string.

tasks.title: Add assignee forwarding test
definition_of_done: External command-path receives --assignee value in argv.
Test verifies the arg list captured by a stub command.
./tests/run.sh passes.

recommended.approach: Extend the loop command-path test or add a new test that captures argv to a file.
